text: John Gates Powell (June 25, 1947 â€“ August 18, 2022) was an American track and field athlete who focused in the discus throw. He set a world record at 69.08 meters in 1975. He won a bronze medal at the 1976 and 1984 Summer Olympics. Powell died on August 18, 2022 at the age of 75.John Powell ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American track and field athletes Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Discus throwers Category:Sportspeople from San Francisco
title: John Powell (discus thrower)
